title: Ethical AI Usage for Dating
subtitle: Using Technology Responsibly to Enhance Your Authentic Self

philosophy.title: My Ethical Approach
philosophy.description: I believe AI should enhance your authentic self, not create a false persona. My methods teach you to use AI as a tool to better represent who you truly are, not to deceive or mislead potential matches.
principles: No fake luxury lifestyles or meaningless Ferrari photos
AI is a means to an end when used with good intent
Focus on realistic, casual smartphone-style photos
Enhance your best features, don't create false ones

method.title: The Most Realistic AI Photo Method
method.description: My approach teaches you to generate photos that look natural and authentic - the kind of photos you'd actually take with your smartphone. No 'photoshoot-ish' looks that scream 'this is AI generated'.

examples.title: Judge for Yourself
examples.description: See examples of my AI-generated photos below. Notice how they look like natural, casual photos you'd take yourself - not obvious AI creations.
examples.note: These examples demonstrate the realistic, authentic style I teach in my guide.

transparency.title: Complete Transparency
transparency.description: I'm upfront about using AI tools because I believe in ethical dating practices. The goal is to help you present your best authentic self, not to deceive anyone.
